page.title: 2011+ EDUCATION ON ALSTON MOOR
page.content: {Samuel King's School}is a comprehensive school for children in the age-range 11-18, the smallest in the country. Organisation is on a year basis. Pupils in the first three years follow the same curriculum pattern. T.V.E.I.(Technical,Vocational Education Initiative) occupies a quarter of the teaching time in the fourth and fifth years. Examination courses are offered at G.C.E. 'O'Level, 16+ and C.S.E.. G.C.E. 'A'Level courses are available in the sixth form. {Alston Further Education Centre}offers a varied programme of activities, many of the courses taking place at Samuel King's School,which provides a meeting place for a considerable number of affiliated societies. Material compiled by staff and pupils of Samuel King's School,Alston.
